name: RECOIL (itch) (Dark Dungeon Studio)
description:
- INCOMPLETE JAM ENTRY -

[PHYSICS JAM 2021 (South Africa) - Solo - Hobbyist]

RECOIL is a multiplayer ragdoll physics based shooter game.

Balance, aim, shoot, and run!

Aim carefully and use your shots wisely!

The bigger the gun, the bigger the RECOIL!

CONTROLS

  • Movement: WASD
  • Jump: Space
  • Mouse: Aim
  • Shoot: Left Mouse Button
  • Change weapons [1, 2]
  • Reload: R

FEATURES

  • Network multiplayer gameplay [ZA Server]
  • Active Ragdolls
  • Physics based shooter... deal with the recoil

MISSING FEATURES

  • IK Aiming
  • Game over condition
  • Music
  • Sound Effects

BUGS

  • Network doesn't sync properly
  • Hosting a new game fails sometimes
  • Reloading and switching weapons will skip the reload animation

ASSETS USED

  • Font: Xirod (Free Commercial)

TOOLS USED

  • UNITY
  • BLENDER
  • AUDACITY
  • PHOTOSHOP

LEARNINGS

  • I learned how Photon PUN 2 and Photon Bolt networking works
  • I learned how to create a Ragdoll
  • I learned how to make a Ragdoll "active" by copying animations
